main.name: Jeff Lung
main.description: Welcome to my portfolio website which is enhanced by React JS and hosted on Github
main.bio: An experienced web designer. I completed a Software Development Bootcamp course with JustIT in January 2023. I am looking for a role of Web Design. Besides, I am also seeking a junior role as a route into the UX Design industry. I am eager to learn from experienced UX Designers and to learn new tools, technologies and methodologies, in order to become an effective member of a UX Design team.
main.bio2: I am competent with most of the Adobe suite softwares, like Photoshop, Illustrator, XD, Aftereffect, Animate and Dreamweaver. Moreover, I also worked by using Maya, from modelling to the rendering procedures. For coding languages, I am familiar with HTML, CSS, Jquery. I am still improving my JavaScript and ReactJs knowledge.
main.bio4: On the other hand, I love movie and video game as well. The other person I admire a lot is a Japanese video game creator, Hideo Kojima, as he is a pioneer combining video game interaction into a deeply story telling approach. Through playing Kojima's Metal Gear Solid series, I started to concentrate more on storytelling and camera work in video game, and GTA from episode IV is also my favourite. Afterwards, I enjoy immerse myself in video game with a convoluted plot and compelling dialogues, because I could experience with movie in a playful way and this is immersive for me to another world. All in all, I believe as a designer, we could convey our message with different kind of media such as website, video, game with some sort of storytelling approach.
main.bio5: Otherwise, I like doing exercise like jogging and Tai Chi also. As I could sweat a lot while I am jogging and this could rejuvenate my mind and body, while Tai Chi could help my mind to be refreshed and staying calm which could help a better state for work.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: I am competent with most of Adobe suite softwares and I worked with 3D sofwares as well.

education.school: Coventry University (Jointly run in Hong Kong)
education.description: Through this degree course, I learnt usability, coding skill, multimedia softwares advanced usage, marketing skill through a movie business model. The final project gave me a chance to learn Unity3D to create my first short mobile game demo in Android.

education.school: School for Higher and Professional Education of VTC
education.degree: Professional Diploma in Game Design & Production
education.description: In this program, I learnt basic theories for pc game production like concept art, 3D softwares, programming, and it also covered some mobile game knowledge.

education.degree: Certificate in 3D Computer Animation and Modeling
education.description: This program covered general knowledge for using Maya from modeling to rendering. I have learnt creating motion graphic like logo animation in the course.
I have learnt how to build a realistic character in Maya and create animation with it. The skills could be applied on animation and game.

education.school: Hong Kong University of Science and Technology
education.description: This course covered from Graphic Design theory to software applications for graphic design, web development and video editing. It helped me to build a solid fundamental knowledge for my designer career.

resume.bio3: In my pastime, I like to explore up-to-date techniques of website coding because I enjoy to express the aesthetics through the web media, such as animation and the website layout. Recently, I am keeping to enhance my React knowledge and I also explore the 3D framework for React, React Three Fiber. On the other hand, I am into visiting the events about up-to-date web and media technology, such as the Siggraph Asia. Actually, I have attended this event several times when it was held in Singapore, Hong Kong and Macau, and I enjoyed the content about latest technology for web, Computer Graphic and game. Otherwise, I like jogging and Tai Chi, as they could help me to rejuvenate and relax.

testimonials.text: I have been Jeff's supervisor for almost 7 years, Jeff did a good job in his position, and was responsible  for web supporting including HTML, web interface, web banner and icon design, etc. Jeff is organised and highly responsive to his duties with good manner He is reliable who can accomplish his tasks successfully. I believe that Jeff will be a valuable teammate to the work of any institution.
testimonials.user: Stanley Yam, Creative Director of Dreamshub Limited

testimonials.text: Jeff was mainly responsible for maintaining and updating our company's website and answering all our questions pertaining to our IT needs. During the period Jeff has proven himself to be profoundly knowledgeable and skillful in getting his job done. We are also extremely satisfied with Jeff's positive and hard-working attitude. We have found him as a responsible, responsive, effective and efficient partner to work with. We have no reservation in recommending Jeff to whoever can utilize his skills in the IT and online marketing field.
testimonials.user: Gary Chow, Managing Director of Hong Kong NuHart Medical Hair Transplant

testimonials.text: Jeff was responsible for the preparation of design project especially at the on-line marketing material such as Banner Ad, 3D Animation, E-mailer, Websites & Video Editing etc. Apart from being a good team member, Jeff also displayed considerable initiative and approached his work thoughtfully and intelligently. Jeff also impressed me of being able to rise above the call of duty on certain occasions and was more than capable of taking up extra responsibilities.
testimonials.user: Anson Tam, Art Director of Town Health Management and Services Limited
